headline: Medtronic (MDT) Valuation: Assessing Potential After Raised Outlook and Strong Quarterly Growth
summary: Medtronic (MDT) gave investors something to talk about after reporting higher sales and profits compared to last year, and raising its outlook for both revenue and earnings. See our latest analysis for Medtronic. Medtronic’s upbeat outlook has added fuel to a rally that’s been building for much of this year, with the stock’s share price climbing nearly 31% year-to-date and posting a robust 11.6% 1-month gain. Strong quarterly results and plans for strategic acquisitions in high-growth therapy...
